description:
When the battle threatens to ruin farmland, Seth does his best to protect the crops. Ocoho is impressed and casts defensive magic to help him, but she`s reprimanded for going against orders. But then Queen Boudica appears and praises Ocoho for protecting the land as the legendary sorcerer Merlin did. The farmers also say that a spirit called the Dullahan started appearing in the area around the same time as the Spectral Nemesis...
Source: crunchyroll
